scripts.pretest: npm run compile && rimraf cucumber-report && mkdirp cucumber-report && mkdirp cucumber-report/screenshots
scripts.s12: set remote=true & cucumber-js -c resources/cucumber_options_config.json -p ui -p safari-12.1
scripts.s13: set remote=true & cucumber-js -c resources/cucumber_options_config.json -p ui -p safari-13.1
scripts.s14: set remote=true & cucumber-js -c resources/cucumber_options_config.json -p ui -p safari-14.1
scripts.s15: set remote=true & cucumber-js -c resources/cucumber_options_config.json -p default -p safari-15.6
